meta.title: Borrow - Sovryn
meta.description: 0% interest loans with Sovryn's Zero protocol. Borrow ZUSD or DLLR against your Bitcoin in a fully decentralized system. Increase your earning potential today.

gettingStartedPopup.title: Put your loan to work
gettingStartedPopup.description: Here are a few ideas for what you can do with your loan:

pool.title: Pool
pool.description: Earn BTC by depositing into the Zero stability pool or Sovryn DLLR/RBTC Pool.

lend.title: Lend
lend.description: Earn interest by providing liquidity to the Sovryn lending protocol.

trade.title: Trade
trade.description: Buy more BTC or other assets using the Sovryn exchange protocol.

bridge.title: Bridge
bridge.description: Convert your loan into popular stablecoins on BSC and Ethereum.

notification.title: Email notifications
notification.description: Receive important alerts about the state of your line of credit and the Zero protocol

errors.ratioWarningInRecovery: Keeping your collateral ratio above {{value}}% can reduce the risk of liquidation in cases of market volatility
errors.ratioErrorInRecovery: Collateral ratio must be ≥ {{value}}% in recovery mode
errors.ratioWarning: Keeping your collateral ratio above {{value}}% can help avoid liquidation under recovery mode
errors.ratioError: Collateral ratio must be at least {{value}}%
errors.ratioDecreased: New collateral ratio must be greater than {{value}}%
errors.balanceTooLow: The collateral amount you're trying to deposit exceeds your balance by {{value}}
errors.collateralTooLow: Collateral balance must be at least {{value}}
errors.withdrawBalanceTooLow: The collateral amount you're trying to withdraw exceeds your trove balance by {{value}}
errors.repayBalanceTooLow: The {{currency}} amount you're trying to repay exceeds your balance by {{value}}
errors.creditBalanceTooLow: The {{currency}} amount you're trying to borrow exceeds your maximum by {{value}}
errors.totalDebtTooLow: The total debt must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}
errors.newTotalDebtTooLow: The new total debt must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}
errors.newCollateralTooLow: Add collateral amount must be at least {{value}} {{currency}}

meta.title: Rewards - Sovryn
meta.description: Claim BTC rewards from Zero's Stability Pool and transfer them to your wallet or active Line of Credit in Sovryn's Zero protocol. Start earning rewards today.

totalRewardsEarned.title: Total rewards earned
totalRewardsEarned.helper: This is calculated by recording the rewards earned per block since the first rewards earned, noting the value of the reward in BTC at the time it is earned, then summing the results.

promotions.p1: Provide a 1:1 ratio of two assets to the AMM pool and instantly start accruing your share of weekly rewards.

poolsTable.returnsInfo: The return rate shown is based on swap fees, plus liquidity mining rewards (if applicable), earned by the given pool in the previous 24 hour period, extrapolated to show an estimated annual percentage rate of return.

poolStatistics.lpFeeRateInfo: The fee rate that is charged per swap and given to AMM LPs
poolStatistics.bitocracyFeeRateInfo: The fee rate that is charged per swap and given to SOV stakers
poolStatistics.totalSwapFeeRateInfo: The sum of the LP fee rate and Bitocracy fee rate

verifiedPage.subtitle: You are now signed up for Sovryn email notifications. If you ever want to unsubscribe, you can do so using the unsubscribe link in any notification email or by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.

unsubscribedPage.title: Unsubscribed
unsubscribedPage.subtitle: Your email address has been unsubscribed from Sovryn email notifications regarding the specific Rootstock address associated with your unsubscribe request. You can sign up again at any time by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.

unsubscribedAllPage.title: Unsubscribed
unsubscribedAllPage.subtitle: Your email address has been unsubscribed from all Sovryn email notifications and removed from the notification system. You can sign up again at any time by visiting the email notification settings section of the Sovryn app.
